website_summaries.verdict: This is the shoe you think of when you picture Uggs: chunky suede boots lined with soft sheep fleece. This classic style is the epitome of easy weekend "toss on your leggings and go," but you can also have some fun pairing it with a casual skirt, flare-bottom pants, or even a dress.
pros: The high-calf length goes well with just about any fashion choice
Sheepskin suede outer with nylon binding
The insole is foam, and the boot is lined with Uggpure fleece
Available in seven colors of suede and black leather
cons: Uggs are definitely a matter of personal preference: you either love the style or you hate it

customer_reviews.title: Fake advertising
customer_reviews.text: Got these “UGG” boots I was so excited to get them, everything seemed perfect but when I took a closer look they were fake they are literally made in China I would not recommend for you to purchase this item TOTAL FRAUD.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed. What a scam
customer_reviews.text: These are not Uggs. These are bear paws. bought them for my wife for Christmas. So disappointed. What a scam!!! Box says UGGS but they are not.
customer_reviews.author: louie esparza jr

customer_reviews.title: Fake Ugg's
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter and they are not real UGGs. Must be a knock of from China. We sent them back and are ordering from UGG's website.
customer_reviews.author: kenny10

customer_reviews.title: Brand new with a hole in the boot
customer_reviews.text: I received these as a Christmas gift from my husband and after wearing them for 2 hours I noticed there is a hole in the back of my boot. Because he ordered them early, before they were sold out the return window is over and now we are out $200!! Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Just received my order and I dont think these are ...
customer_reviews.text: Just received my order and I dont think these are real. Uggs run large and these are incredibly small. First off the box is plain that they arrived in. The inside tabs do not have ugg anywhere and when I looked up fake vs real that is one sign. Order from the Ugg store, they are the same price!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are fake! My boots only say UGG on ...
customer_reviews.text: They are fake! My boots only say UGG on the label - it should say UGG australia. I realized it too late. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great & legit, but Men’s sizes!
customer_reviews.text: Amazon has it titled as “Women’s”, but these are Universal. They are sold w/Men’s sizing & no half sizes, but Amazon implies it’s women’s sizing, Wrong!! If you wear a Women’s 10, expect to buy the 9. Even that is a little loose after breaking in, however they’re meant to be worn bare foot and nails can wear the front quicker, so loose is better. I’ve worn these since I was a kid and they last a couple years. Deckers owns them and has manufacturing in Japan, China & Vietnam. These are not fakes. Ugg site has images to help ID fakes. These are legit and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea M

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: I'm confused. Are these fake? I buy the same pair of Uggs every winter at the mall and never have a problem. I won't buy them online ever again, first and last time. There is a hole in the top of my left UGG! I am not a heavy person, I weigh 105 pounds and don't see that breaking a shoe in only a few months. They are not worn daily, maybe 2 times per work for short periods of time. I am livid!!!
customer_reviews.author: Justabuyer

customer_reviews.title: Worth The Money!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 7 1/2 so I bout an 8. I figured that since there is extra cushion (fur) on the inside I 'd better go a half size up. They are definitely authentic and so far waterproof. Its currently snowing here in the Chi and I've been walking in inches of soft and wet snow with no seepage. Very comfortable and very warm. Totally worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: GiveMePlur

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots that don't last
customer_reviews.text: Wife loved these boots. Unfortunately the seam on the outside of the ankle only lasted a month of casual use. She's had pairs of this boot in the past that wore well so I don't know where the build quality went.
customer_reviews.author: Adam O.

customer_reviews.title: Love the boots but the extra you're paying for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the boots but the extra you're paying for the "water resistance" is not real. Doesn't work. DO NOT USE THEM while RAINING or do not step on water nor have water touch it. IT WILL Stain them. Not too effective
customer_reviews.author: Conrado Bautista

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: I received a completely different brand of boots. They came in an Ugg box, but was some completely different brand of cheap boot. Very Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Britney

customer_reviews.title: These are authentic, ignore the reviews that say they’re not
customer_reviews.text: I have no clue what people are talking about when they said these are fake. They’re uggs... for real... If you’ve ever had uggs before and ever had fake uggs before you should be able to tell. I have been a faithful owner of real uggs and costco uggs and a one time owner of old navy uggs, these are real uggs. Ps that means they will stretch out! Order a half size down
customer_reviews.author: FaustineTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Genuine Uggs.
customer_reviews.text: First of all these are genuine Uggs. They are classic tall model 2. They are not the original classic tall. they measure exactly as described at 12 3/4 inches tall. The sole is exactly the same as pictured on all the other websites. Yes they are made in China, as all Uggs are. But Amazon is not going to be selling counterfeit UGGs. Period. The confusion arises when people compare them to the original classic tall, which these are not, they are newer model. They run slightly smaller in length than the original classic tall and slightly shorter in height.
customer_reviews.author: jam

customer_reviews.title: Buy elsewhere and know what you’re getting
customer_reviews.text: Can’t be sure about the authenticity of these boots. The material of the shaft is unusually thin and pliable. This is the sixth pair of Uggs that I have owned. When new, the boots are normally thick and and a bit stiff. There is usually twice as much fleece on the interior. Really disappointed and will be returning these. Edit - just compared these closely with four other pairs of varying ages in my closet. These are not the same height (even after accounting for the drop when broken in) and the sheepskin is a much cheaper knockoff. These are either fake or the quality of Uggs has plummeted!!
customer_reviews.author: K. Murmello

customer_reviews.title: Not real uggs
customer_reviews.text: These are a good dupe, but they are not real. At first they seemed okay when I took them out of the box, but after wearing for a few days around the house the lack of quality became very clear. They have stretched out almost a full size, there is very little density or softness to the inside lining (unlike other uggs I have owned) and the outside is falling apart. It's as if the exterior lambskin is slowly disintegrating, wearing off.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: These are FAKE
customer_reviews.text: These are fake, didn’t realize till I bought ones from the store I’ll attach pictures just buy them from the website or store not worth the two day shipping barely held up had them less then a year uggs I bought at the store have lasted me 2 winters before getting unwearable You can tell in the little things fur on the inside is not as soft/ got matted, authentic tag is lower down on the real ones, height difference (even when I straighten the slouched old one it does not equal height) Purchase at ur own risk !!! They are great fakes I’ve been wearing uggs for years and didn’t notice till I got my fresh new pair!!
customer_reviews.author: Nunya

customer_reviews.title: Little support.  Cute but impractical for all day on your feet wear.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 9. I ordered both the 9 and 10 in this boot. Without socks, the 10 fit me. The shaft is a little tight for me; it fits, but if they’d offered a wide-shaft option, I’d have definitely used that. Although the foot bed feels nice with its soft and fuzzy covering, there’s little support at all. If I were on my feet all day, these would not be comfortable for me. If Skechers still made their version of this boot, I’d be happier with it, even though it did not have the fuzzy and soft foot bed. Overall these are overpriced for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: travelingirl

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in decline of the quality of UGG! Stained my finger tips just tried to the boots on..
customer_reviews.text: The pair I got was made in China, I know now UGG has factory all over the world but seriously? I am talking about quality control..Seems like there is none. I am so disappointed!! It stained all over my fingertips, I just try to put them on!! I don't want to go out with black finger tips/nails.. everytime I wear these boots.. plus the boots feels very flimsy, I definitely don't want to pay $200 for these pair. No thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Real Uggs, shipped next day at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wife and she loves them. She wears a size 6 and a size 6 fit perfect. Best price I could find anywhere and these shipped next day. She says they are incredibly comfortable and even in the winter now with snow everywhere, these are holding up great. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Just trying to help =)

customer_reviews.title: very tight around leg
customer_reviews.text: these are very tight around the top of the leg . I know I am fat but I had the 1st classic tall boots and they were great but these are cutting into my legs and I would never be able to tuck jeans into them. I bought the koolaburra by ugg in tall and they don't cut into my leg and they look good but they are stiff and give me blisters around the ankle. the real uggs don't give me blisters but I need to lose some weight fast or cut a slit in the top of these boots do disappointed..1st time a pair of genuine uggs have disappointed me
customer_reviews.author: Confused buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great boot, but check the circumference of your calves first .......
customer_reviews.text: I read through previous reviews and followed their direction -- I'm an 8.5 but got the 8. The boot fits well around my feet and I know I will be warm. What I really should have taken into account is the calf circumference size. Yes, I have weird legs. It fits well and pulls up okay on my right leg but the boot is really tight around my calf on my left leg. Sigh. I will wear them though.
customer_reviews.author: EFUpstateNY

customer_reviews.title: FAKE UGGS DON'T BUY
customer_reviews.text: Fake UGGs! Don't buy! I have been wearing UGGS for years and these are probably one of the worst knockoffs. Even the UGGS store said these boots are not real.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love these boots!
customer_reviews.text: I had previously worn a different type of UGG Boot that costs a bit less. No comparison! These are the cozy, soft boots I remember from years ago, the ultimate in comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Daniel

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Love my uggs!! Shipping took a little while but not too long. They’re the real thing just Incase anyone thinks they’re knock offs, they aren’t. So so warm and comfy. I’m usually a size 8.5 in shoes so I got a 9 and they’re a perfect fit. I also bought a waterproofing spray and it works amazingly. My uggs are dry in the snow and rain and in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing quality ... I walked with my boots on the wet grass and the tip of the boots got wet! They have had the wet stain in the top of the boots for over a month! They are ruined. Bad quality and so disappointing for me that UGGS made such a bad product.
customer_reviews.author: Mariana Lombard

customer_reviews.title: warm
customer_reviews.text: well, they aren't water proof but i sprayed them. they are comfortable and since i am traveling to boston in February and needed to replace my 15 y.o. uggs i bit the bullet and bought these. as usual they are great for traveling through airports easy to slip on and off
customer_reviews.author: susanmeyers

customer_reviews.title: Need advice on how to protect my new Uggs
customer_reviews.text: These Uggs met my expectations in terms of look, feel and fit. I haven't worn them yet because I just purchased the Ugg cleaning kit and want to spray them before I wear them. Since they are black in color, I'm trying to find out if spraying them will impact the color. I read one review that said spraying them made them look chalky .
customer_reviews.author: Terry T.

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: I live in UGG boots over the winter months, I love how comfortable they are and warm! My last pair before purchasing this pair I had for almost 10years and they held up very well! My only complaint is sometimes the stitching on the top that goes over your foot is tight and can be uncomfortable until you wear them for awhile. But otherwise they are worth the money cause they last so long!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Had Legitimacy Concerns. Ended up buying from Uggs directly and compared.
customer_reviews.text: Found a lot of differences in craftsmanship, packaging, and quality. Pretty shocking differences actually. Either this amazon pair is 100% real fugazi or they're QC reject/RTV outlet bound real pairs. The QR code on the amazon purchased pair did not work. The QR code on the pair from the manufacturer store works as intended. Be careful yall. Your chick is gonna be pissed if she ends up with a pair of OOG's
customer_reviews.author: El Duderino

customer_reviews.title: Love  Uggs
customer_reviews.text: I returned these because my kids bought a pair for Christmas. I love my Uggs & live in them as soon as the temperatures drop...just want to say that some reviewers claim Uggs bought from Amazon are fakes because they are made in China: well, I’ve been buying Uggs for close to 30 years and they have always been made in China...& the quality is always great.
customer_reviews.author: mbn

customer_reviews.title: Great boot!
customer_reviews.text: A must have!! Fits as expected, I wear a 6.5 and ordered a 6 because of the whole sizing. If you like to wear thick socks with your UGGS size up rather than down for half sizes. They really are water resistant. And black goes with everything 🤗
customer_reviews.author: jilnu

customer_reviews.title: Starting to question the authenticity
customer_reviews.text: These are super tight around my calves. I'm not sure why. I have a chestnut pair that I bought from the Ugg store and the fit light a dream. Every time I have tried to wear them, they choke the life out of my calves. I am considering sending them back. Has anyone else had a similar experience with this purchase??
customer_reviews.author: V. Lee

customer_reviews.title: These are REAL certified Uggs
customer_reviews.text: These are extremely cute & comfy I bought a size 9 as recommended by Amazon. I thought the calf opening would be too small but it fit my 13 inch calf’s (x track & field star) with plenty of space . Will be getting other colors for my daughter and granddaughters.
customer_reviews.author: seasoneddiva

customer_reviews.title: Great Boot
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of genuine Uggs. They are warm and snuggly and the fit was perfect. They are so warm that I don't wear socks in them. In time, I just wipe the inside with alcohol and place a generic tea bag in the toe. The alcohol will get rid of germs and the tea bag odors.
customer_reviews.author: CeeBee

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE Counterfeit
customer_reviews.text: Received a counterfeit pair of boots. They arrived later than expected and when I received them they were in a generic unmarked box. The boots were flimsy in the shaft with a very stiff sole. The label on the back was missing the trademark as well.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Evans

customer_reviews.title: Love my UGGzzzzz
customer_reviews.text: Received these bad boys for Christmas and kept my feet warm all winter long. They are always comfortable and easy to slip on and off. UGG are UGG, you have to keep them away from water and make sure you get an UGG cleaner along with it to help maintain its look and never to dull.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful, remember with ugg boots to go a half size down not up like normal boots because the sheep's wool stretch out on the inside and they will get to Biggs otherwise after a couple weeks of wear.
customer_reviews.author: Gaialove

customer_reviews.title: Fingers are crossed
customer_reviews.text: I noticed they’re lighter than my old Uggs. Since it’s not winter, I haven’t tested how well they wear yet. I’m not a big fan of the all black UGG label on the ankle. It loses a bit of its brand charm. The fit is just right.
customer_reviews.author: Willow

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, just be careful if you have a high ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits great, just be careful if you have a high arch. I don't think I do and this boot fits very snug across the top. I'm sure they will stretch out a little as they always do. I use a thin sock and I'm fine. I put them on for the first time and went out all day. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Delepine

customer_reviews.title: warm winter boot - fits thin calves!
customer_reviews.text: With all these options for extra wide calf boots available when the majority of regular sized boots are already WAY too wide around my calf it’s SO nice to find such an awesome boot that actually hugs my calf rather than hanging open around the top. People with very slender legs need boots too. Thank you UGGs!!!
customer_reviews.author: E.M.

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my mom who is a size 7. ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my mom who is a size 7. As soon as she tried it on she knew it wasn't going to work. We had to go a full size up and she says it fits perfectly now.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Park

customer_reviews.title: I think they’re fake!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sure these are fake. All my other Uggs fit perfect and feel amazing....these are WAY small and just feel ok. Very tight across the top of the ankle where the stitching is, and the calves are super snug (and I have small legs!). I even double checked to make sure they didn’t send me kids by mistake. They are very good fakes, but still fakes i believe. And the inside tag seems a bit off....like it’s attached by tape/adhesive? I’ll add pics of that. Returning and already purchased off the Ugg website.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Love! Love! Love!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves them. She ask for them for Christmas at the last minute. I would not have been able to have them delivered in time but thanks to Amazon Prime! Product was in perfect condition as well as packaging! Thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: latasha l. gray

customer_reviews.title: There are no half sizes available so be prepared to also buy insoles.
customer_reviews.text: There is no half size for these boots so doesn’t fit perfectly. Had to buy insoles as I got a larger size. The insoles were $19.99. Had to cut them so I could get them inside the shoe. The boots are warm and comfy but they are not meant for long walks like taking your doggie for a walk etc.
customer_reviews.author: Shamama Jafri

customer_reviews.title: Uggs are the Best
customer_reviews.text: I was given a pair of similiar Uggs 16 years ago. They were Fantastic.... and they were my 2 go boots every winter. Then I took them off one night and one of them landed on my base board heater.... Next morning part of the sole had melted away... The only thing that ever caused them damage. So this year I treated myself and got a new pair... They are just as wonderful as previous pair.....But, I had to go up one size...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Possibly fakes...
customer_reviews.text: This is my 7/8th pair of Uggs. I suspect these are fakes. I always wear a size 8, and these are too large, and the left is significantly larger than the right. They are also not as thick as my previous Tall Classic Uggs (which were also purchased on Amazon). I sent an email to the Seller, and got no response.
customer_reviews.author: TAWNY HELENE WHITAKER

customer_reviews.title: Genuine UGG product
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful and comfortable. They are genuine UGGs. If you have calves that are larger these won't fit you as they have a narrow fit. It makes for a nice silhouette.
customer_reviews.author: aseriousloverofbooks

customer_reviews.title: Soft, comfy, fit well
customer_reviews.text: Finally! They were back in stock. I waited three years for uggs that fit me in the style I wanted. Very comfy. Fit better than any other brand I’ve tried.
customer_reviews.author: TeachingMama2

customer_reviews.title: The best warm boot
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my mom for Christmas. They were to replace her 20-year-old pair that had finally seen better days. These are perfect for our winters. I do not wear mine with socks and they keep my feet warm and cozy even when it's in the '20s or cooler outside. Our all-time favorite boots and favorite color!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warm and Fashionable Feer
customer_reviews.text: These boots are SO warm and soft, on the inside! Very fashionable. The color goes with almost everything. My firstbpair of UGGS and I could not be more happy and satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Sequoia Hammel

customer_reviews.title: The boots are true to size.
customer_reviews.text: Theses boots fit perfect, wore them yesterday in 5 degrees weather and they were very warm. I did wear socks with them. I heard some people do not, but it was my preference to wear them. Love the color, it's a little different. Mostly I'v e seen the camel color and of course black. I love the chocolate color. Would definitely recommend this boot .
customer_reviews.author: Deb S.

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Love them this is my 4th pair of uggs in a m9re then 20 year span- durable warm and very cute and sexy...in a mountain aussy girl kind of way..
customer_reviews.author: Penelope Peet

customer_reviews.title: The Boot for Her
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these boots for my fiancé, she absolutely loves them. I’ve been buying her Ugg boots for 10 years. We have never been disappointed. I’ll buy more for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Original UGG tall winter boots. Perfect size and color.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased UGG women’s classic tall winter boots recently. They are the perfect size and color. They are not knock offs! They are exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Lyans

customer_reviews.title: They are real!
customer_reviews.text: After reading some of the reviews I was hesitant to buy them but I’m glad I got them they are real they are comfy and great for the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Mely

customer_reviews.title: Genuine Uggs!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my new boots today. They are beautiful and keep my feet warm. They came in the original UGG box and says made in Vietnam. I got them one size smaller because I heard that they stretch. Love them so far...
customer_reviews.author: Isabel

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift and the person loved them. They fit well and are very warm and comfortable. She really liked the color as well.
customer_reviews.author: jessie_2580

customer_reviews.title: Is best to try them on before purchasing
customer_reviews.text: I think they are ok I wish I had tried them before buying so just that little recommendation if you can go to a store and tried them on before to buy that should be the best.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Nineth Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Love these classic Uggs!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting this color for a long time. Got them for Christmas and love them!!!! I love the classic Ugg look and will probably get every color I can!!
customer_reviews.author: Loveto Shop

customer_reviews.title: So comfy and the best Uggs!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these!! Perfect Uggs ready for winter coming up!! I’m a huge Ugg lover and have lots and lots of pairs but these are classic and everyone should own a pair!!
customer_reviews.author: Chelle

customer_reviews.title: Warm and light, BUT dangerous on ice
customer_reviews.text: The boot is cozy, comfortable, and very lightweight. Because they do not come in half-sizes, however, the size 8 is long on my size 7.5 foot, and I trip over my toes. My biggest complaint is the lack of any traction on ice. Even walking in a parking lot or along a sidewalk can be treacherous. In this regard, I much prefer Pajar of Canada.
customer_reviews.author: Periwinkle

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Love them and they are definitely real , bought a brown pair from Nordstrom just becouse I wanted to compare them there was no difference what so ever I even brought them to the ugg store they confirmed that the uggs I believe ugh the from amazon were definitely real so I don’t know were thes bad reviews are coming from maybe you should stop dealing with 3D parties and stick with amazon prime
customer_reviews.author: VITA petrone

customer_reviews.title: LEGIT AND WIFE LOVED THEM
customer_reviews.text: perfect, wife loved them and they are legit I might add, I've seen some reviews where the customers said they received fake UGG from different sellers, but not in this case, I will recommend and order from them again..
customer_reviews.author: peter parker

customer_reviews.title: but these UGGS fit like gloves! Amazing and I just never want to ...
customer_reviews.text: I never purchase shoes online they are difficult to buy without trying, but these UGGS fit like gloves! Amazing and I just never want to take them off!
customer_reviews.author: Lena Matheos

customer_reviews.title: My go to
customer_reviews.text: These are great, perfect . So comfortable. Run a little big but if you wear socks you will be fine. Extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Lori Paulsen

customer_reviews.title: She Loves Them!
customer_reviews.text: These were bought as a present and the surprised look on her face was exciting to see. She loved to taller height and the look was perfect. This item runs about a half size larger than regular shoe size. The ordering and delivery process was exactly what you expect from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: John Weber

customer_reviews.title: Great boots, true to size
customer_reviews.text: Love my new boots so comfortable, so pretty, so nice and warm, I ordered a half size up, and I will be able to wear thick socks, but real comfortable with no sock!!! Love them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Verified customer

customer_reviews.title: Check size guidelines carefully
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to judge size. Footwear should always be tried on first. No arch support. Not waterproof. Prefer shorter height because tall legs get caught on wide calves and there are no gussets.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia in DC

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and comfort
customer_reviews.text: I wear a true size 10....in these a size 9 is a perfect fit..If i had got a size 10 they would have been to big..
customer_reviews.author: Big Mike

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves them
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves them. She says they are VERY warm. But says she loves them. Very comfortable. Just really hot.
customer_reviews.author: Llih

customer_reviews.title: Calf too tight
customer_reviews.text: I am a female 145 lb 5 to I workout and I feel like these are really tight on the calf! I can't even pull them up all the way because they're so tight on my calf. They scrunch down at the bottom I'm going to give it a few weeks hopefully I can stretch them out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WARM, TALL, FOLDABLE
customer_reviews.text: GREAT, I finally bought the real thing. I was buying the knock offs from COSTCO every other year. These are taller, you can fold down the top to make various lengths, extremely WARM. I'm glad I went pro!
customer_reviews.author: TOPSY

customer_reviews.title: warm and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: nice, warm and comfortable. I would suggest to buy clean products for these to maintain good looks. rain will possibly leave stain.
customer_reviews.author: MHS48161

customer_reviews.title: Happy wife...
customer_reviews.text: My wife was really happy to get some new Uggs for Christmas, her old ones were tattered.
customer_reviews.author: B.EZ

customer_reviews.title: Made my wife extremely happy!
customer_reviews.text: My wife already had the mid size boot in black so she knew what to expect nonetheless she was ecstatic upon rcv'g them!
customer_reviews.author: Old Doc Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Knock offs
customer_reviews.text: My husband ordered these for me for Christmas. I'm happy he showed them to me before wrapping them because they were definitely NOT real Uggs. Felt cheap and didnt have the same trademarking as my other pair of Uggs that we got from an actual Ugg store. He returned them and ordered from the Ugg website.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Instead of several less expensive gifts, my granddaughter requested these boots and she was very happy with them at Christmas time. (Sorry so late in rating)
customer_reviews.author: Linda M. Squillini

customer_reviews.title: Worth the expense
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing Uggs for years. Yes they are expensive but they last for years if you care for them.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Olsen

customer_reviews.title: NOT your favorite Uggs.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve worn uggs my entire life. These are NOT it. I have about 4 pairs in rotation - waited too long to try these on and return them - assumed they were just like my regular Uggs. They are thinner. Less soft. Less fluffy. Same cost! Not the uggs you know and love.
customer_reviews.author: Corbin Lajeunesse

customer_reviews.title: My tall wife loves them.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my 5'11" wife who gets cold when it goes below 75 degrees! Look and fit great.
customer_reviews.author: LanceDr

customer_reviews.title: Runs 1-1.5 US sizes big
customer_reviews.text: These fit my wife perfectly, but only because I looked at her old ones to determine which size to order. They actually run 1-1.5 sizes big.
customer_reviews.author: dr.38

customer_reviews.title: Women's size 12 fit my husband.
customer_reviews.text: My husband wanted tall UGG boots. He had some that are over 20yrs old. He couldn't find men's Tall so he ordered women's Tall in size 12. He wears 10/10.5. Guess what? The 12 women's fit just fine!
customer_reviews.author: jus4joy

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable. Love my Uug boots!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit! I where these boots almost everyday during cooler weather in Texas. My old pair was very worn out & too small so I ordered 1 size larger & LOVE THEM!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Time will tell
customer_reviews.text: I received those boots today and immediately tried them on. Several reviews I read before I ordered them, recommended ordering a half size up than your normal size. I’m so glad that I did, otherwise I’d be returning them. I normally wear a 7.5 but ordered an 8. The stitching around the front ankle area is somewhat snug and with the fur lining, I believe it would be too tight. They arrived in perfect condition. I also ordered the care kit for them. Now to wear them and see how “water resistant” they really are. I thought they’d be a little taller? They are a good 5” below my knee.
customer_reviews.author: DianaD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Rich chocolate. Perfect gift. Fits as expected. Completely waterproof. Stylish and extremely warm inside.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Toasty Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Can’t go wrong with Uggs. They’re pricey but will last for years. Unless you coat them, these are not water resistant but they will provide much needed warmth on a cold morning. Size is exact so if you want to wear them with bigger socks, you may want to go up a size but IMHO, they’re much nicer just on your bare feet. ✨
customer_reviews.author: Asta Roseway

customer_reviews.title: My fiancé is obsessed. We spent an hour deciding ...
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé is obsessed. We spent an hour deciding on the right Ugg. Made the right choice for something classy/practical.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Anderson

customer_reviews.title: But after wearing them for a day they already fit more comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: They are tight at first, I ordered a size larger than I normally wear. But after wearing them for a day they already fit more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Britt Eckard

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but there uggs
customer_reviews.text: Fit is good, arrived on tinme and undamaged, cheaper then local store, would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Sand freak

customer_reviews.title: They're knock-offs
customer_reviews.text: These Uggs showed up in a thin plastic bag--not an authentic Ugg box. You could tell when you put them on they were not authentic Uggs as the foot bed was super thin and not fluffy like a real Ugg. I sent them back. They looked like decent imitations of the real thing--but the pair I received were not authentic and not worth the $200 price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: High Price for keeping your feet warm
customer_reviews.text: Big investment but definitely keeps my feet warm! They don’t stay nice and tall after the first few wears. They slouch nearly immediately, outside of the cost - the only drawbacks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Avoid if you have wide calves
customer_reviews.text: Avoid if you have wide calves, I ordered a 1/2 size up to a 9 in hopes that it would fit.. no luck. The quality and material are perfect, mine are original quality Ugg brand. I was shocked that it was so tight halfway up the shin. So disappointed that I have to return, but this brand does not offer a wide fit.
customer_reviews.author: Savana

customer_reviews.title: Ugg girl for life!!
customer_reviews.text: I wear three types of shoes, flip flops, tennis shoes and Uggs! This is my 10th pair over a spans of 20 years!! I still have all 10!! If your on the fence, try them! You’ll never wear another shoe or boot in the colder months !
customer_reviews.author: Alabama Girl

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer!!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves them! She was wearing mine until I bought her a pair for Christmas. I wanted to get her the Sand colored ones, but they were sold out, but it worked out better that way because with the black ,the dirt can’t be seen that much! I’m very happy with the purchase! Happy shopping!!! (Oh, and the package was delivered on time!)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love my UGGs?
customer_reviews.text: After reading other reviews I was worried these could be counterfeit, but I took them to an authorized retailer to confirm that they ARE real UGGs. UGGs do run big, but if you go to the UGG website they have a perfect fit finder - you choose the brand and size of show that fits you best and they give you your best size match.
customer_reviews.author: kk

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Boots look great. Comfortable. The inside of the boot is extremely soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Don Williams

customer_reviews.title: Didn't come with inserts
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy shearling foot inserts, this did not come with the boot...upsetting
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My new go to boot. So comfortable. Wish I had bought years ago
customer_reviews.author: Mackeygirl1

customer_reviews.title: A must!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say but this is a Winter staple! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: CHARING E.

product_meta.title: UGG Women's Classic Tall II Boot
product_meta.description: Our Classic boot was originally worn by surfers to keep warm after early-morning sessions, and has since become iconic for its soft sheepskin and enduring design. The Classic II Tall features two new updates: a pretreated exterior for stain-and-water resistance and a lightweight sole to increase cushioning, durability, and traction. These versatile boots pair well with practically anything – try a flowy floral dress, a silk slip, or loose boyfriend jeans and a velvet top.If you are unsure which shoe size to purchase, please follow the following steps:1)Draw a straight line, longer than your foot, on a piece of paper.2)Place the paper on a flat surface. Stand on the line with your heel and longest toe centered on the line. If measuring a child's foot, it may be easier to hold the paper up to their foot.3)Place a mark on the line at the tip of the longest toe and at the back of the heel.4)Repeat steps 1-3 for the other foot.5)Measure the distance between the marks. Take the larger of the two measurements. 17mm Twinface sheepskin upper. 17mm sheepskin lining. 17mm sheepskin insole.
feature_bullets: Pretreated to repel moisture and stains
UGGpure lining and footbed keep feet feeling breathable and dry
